text: Michel Murr (, 29 September 1932 - 31 January 2021) was a Lebanese politician and businessman. He was born in Metn, Greater Lebanon. From 1990 to 2000, Murr was the Ministry of Interior and Municipalitie during the Elias Hrawi and Ã‰mile Lahoud presidencies. Murr died in Beirut from COVID-19 on 31 January 2021, aged 88. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Beirut Category:Lebanese politicians Category:Lebanese businesspeople
title: Michel Murr
